category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 9 (Safety and Health Management Manager)
contents: Article 9 (Safety and Health Management Manager) ① The safety and health management manager (hereinafter referred to as *Management Manager) is a person who falls under the following items and is in charge of overall safety and health management work of the Corporation. 1. General management manager: Planning Director, 2. Regional Management Manager: Regional Headquarters Manager, ② The Management Manager performs the following duties: 1. Tasks stipulated in each subparagraph of Article 15 (1) of the Industrial Safety Act, 2. Directing and directing safety and health management workers Supervision work, ③ The general manager directs and supervises the safety and health work of the regional manager. ④ The regional manager directs and supervises the safety and health work of the competent branch.
